article: Charlie is one of the most  _  people I have met; she is only twenty-five, but she has traveled to over fifty different  _  . Five years ago, she was a typist in Birmingham, but she decided to give up her  _  and see the world. Since then, her  _  has changed completely. The first time she went  _  was seven years ago,  when  she was just about 18. She took a boat to France and then hitch-hiked around  _  for five weeks. She has visited Europe many times since that first trip,  of course  , but this holiday was the one that made her start traveling. She never forgets the  excitement  of those five weeks--although it was not all enjoyable. When she was on a train, somebody  _  her purse. So she lost all her  _  and had to work in a restaurant for a fortnight . She made some good friends there however, and has  _  several times since then. How did she find money for her  _  ? After her first trip abroad, she went home and worked for two years,  _  all the time. Now she travels  _  , finding work when her money was low. She made a lot of  _  , she says, and she has learned quite a few  _  . Although she has had occasional  _  and had often been sick, she never thought about  giving up  her travels. "My first time abroad changed my life," she says "and I have  _  to travel ever since."
